CustomField.description: The name that the donor provided of the person you should notify about this Donation. If this field is left blank and the Notification Recipient Contact field contains a value, NPSP automatically populates this field with that value.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The name that the donor provided of the person you should notify about this Donation. If this field is left blank and the Notification Recipient Contact field contains a value, NPSP automatically populates this field with that value.
CustomField.label: Notification Recipient Name
